content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite appealing, given its central location and modern amenities. Let's discuss the price that would make both of us happy. How much were you considering to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished state of the apartment, I would propose a price of €550 per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than what I was expecting. The location of this apartment is prime, and I believe the market value is much higher. How about we start at €750 per month, and we can negotiate from there?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the starting point of our negotiation, I propose a price of €650 per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm willing to meet you halfway. If you can agree to €700 per month, we have a deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [700] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Wonderful! We have a deal at €700 per month. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
